feed.title: Google Cloud: Transcoder API
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Transcoder API

entry.content: You can automatically generate subtitle from your input video. For more information, see Configure automatically generated subtitles.
entry.summary: Automatically generate subtitles from your input video.
entry.title: Feature: Auto-generated Subtitles

entry.content: You can process videos with significant number of missing frame by using the fill_content_gaps field. For more information, see troubleshooting guide
entry.summary: You can process videos with many missing frames using the `fill_content_gaps` field.
entry.title: Feature: Process videos with missing frames
